Thanks to its southwest exposure , the apartment is perfectly lit, and its interiors are full of natural light. It's an ideal choice for singles, couples, or as a rental investment. Main advantages of the apartment: Functional layout: Despite its compact size, the apartment has a well-thought-out layout that ensures the comfort of everyday life. Bright interiors: Southwest exposure makes the interiors very bright and cozy. City heating: Guarantees thermal comfort and convenience as well as lower operating costs. Additional space: The apartment includes a balcony , perfect for relaxing outdoors. Why is it worth living in Enklawa Bukowa II? Enklawa Bukowa II is a new development from developer Wawel Service, designed for those who want to invest in the future and live in a modern, green part of Krakow. Located in the PodgÃ³rze district, near Rybitwy PÃ³Å‚noc, this development has enormous potential, aligning with Krakow's strategic development plan. Harmonious Combination of Architecture and Nature The modern and contemporary character of the development is emphasized by elegant architectural forms and a timeless combination of white and anthracite. Carefully planned plantings of grass, shrubs, and trees, including numerous beech trees, will become a symbol of the new, green life of the estate. Phase II of the project will involve the construction of two buildings (five and six stories), with a total of 189 residential units planned. The apartments will vary widely, from one to four rooms, with floor areas ranging from 32.93 m? to 92.98 m?. Functional Spaces and Modern Amenities The apartments in Enklawa Bukowa II have been designed to provide residents with maximum comfort and functionality: Additional space: The apartments are equipped with balconies, the top floors in building C also have terraces, and the ground floor apartments have quiet gardens. Parking: Residents will have access to parking spaces both above ground and in the underground garage, which will also include storage units. Additionally, electric vehicle charging stations will be available throughout the development. For active people: The investment offers bicycle racks and shelters as well as bicycle repair stations. Relaxation and recreation: The estate will feature green recreational areas with benches and tables, and an attractive playground for the youngest residents. The entire estate will be monitored, ensuring a sense of security. Investment with Potential The Rybitwy area is part of Krakow's strategic development plan, which envisions transforming it into a modern, green, and multifunctional district. Purchasing an apartment in Enklawa Bukowa is an investment in the future and the prospect of living in a dynamically developing part of the city that will only increase in value in the coming years. The planned date of handover of the apartments is the second quarter of 2027. I also have other apartments in the investment with areas ranging from 32.93 m? to 92.98 m? . Forma Otwarta is a new, prestigious investment by developer EKOPARK in the heart of Krakow's fashionable Bronowice Wielkie district . Located between Sosnowiecka and MiÄ™sowicza streets, the development offers the perfect balance between dynamic city life and the tranquility and proximity of nature. It's a place where high living comfort is combined with exceptional aesthetics and functionality. Modern Space and Greenery in the Heart of the Estate The development consists of four buildings, and their architecture and spatial development are designed with residents' comfort in mind. A distinctive feature of the development is the oak avenue that runs through its center, guaranteeing greenery and unforgettable views. Modern Apartments in Krakow with Access to Nature. Bunscha Residence is the perfect place for those seeking a modern and comfortable apartment in Krakow, while also valuing proximity to greenery and full infrastructure. This intimate Inter-Bud development, located on Karola Bunscha Street, combines urban convenience with relaxation in the bosom of nature. Location and Infrastructure at Your Fingertips: Living in the Bunscha Residence development in Krakow guarantees access to everything you need every day. The development is adjacent to the ATUT Shopping Center, which offers a wide range of services and shops, including: two large-scale grocery stores, DIY store, electronics stores, clothing stores and drugstores, My Fitness Place fitness club and HalaMAKI Food Hall with restaurants serving cuisines from around the world. Modern Architecture and Living Space: The Bunscha Residence project comprises five five-story buildings, designed with attention to every detail. Ground-floor apartments feature spacious gardens, while upper-floor apartments feature large balconies, perfect for enjoying morning coffee. This is also an excellent investment for rentals in Krakow, thanks to its attractive location and comprehensive serviced amenities. As part of the investment, a commercial part has already been built on the ground floor of the buildings, where the MARKET POINT food delicatessen and the Flario restaurant operate. Relaxation and Outdoor Activity Zone. What sets Bunscha Residence apart is its carefully designed common space. Residents will have access to: a graduation tower that promotes relaxation and health, pedestrian and bicycle routes, a modern playground, well-thought-out pergolas and rich plantings of trees and shrubs, creating a green and friendly environment. Excellent Communication and Amenities: Bunscha Residence is the perfect solution for those who value mobility. Its proximity to the tram and bus terminus and Park & Ride parking lot provides quick connections to every part of Krakow. Drivers will appreciate the easy access to Krakow's southern bypass and the A4 motorway. Each apartment is equipped with municipal central heating (MPEC), ensuring thermal comfort. Residents have access to an elevator, video intercom, underground parking spaces, and storage units. The investment is scheduled to be commissioned in the fourth quarter of 2026. Perfect "turnkey", with air conditioning and optional parking, just 2 km from the Main Square! We present for sale a unique apartment with an area of 44.35 m2, located in the prestigious investment "Nowa 5 Dzielnica" at 53AB WrocÅ‚awska Street in the sought-after district of KrakÃ³w Krowodrza. This is an ideal offer for people who value comfort, safety and quick access to the city center. The apartment is located in a modern, 24/7 guarded and monitored housing estate, just 2 km from the Main Square and the PKP/MDA Railway Station. Excellent public transport ensures quick access to every corner of Krakow. The apartment is ready to move in immediately - fully finished, furnished and equipped to a high standard! The premises are located on the 4th floor (out of 6) of a modern apartment building with an elevator. Its area of 44.35 m2 includes: Bright living room with kitchenette - an ideal place to relax and receive guests. A cozy bedroom - your private oasis of peace. A modern bathroom - functional and aesthetically finished. Practical hall. The apartment includes a spacious balcony overlooking the quiet, green courtyard of the estate, which guarantees peace and privacy. The two-sided exposure (east-west) provides excellent lighting throughout the day. Sale with full, high-quality equipment - just take your suitcase! The apartment is fully equipped with all the necessary elements for everyday life, and most of them are completely new: Kitchenette: fully built-in, with complete household appliances (oven/hob, fridge, hood - please fill in if something is missing), pots and tableware. Living room: comfortable corner sofa, TV cabinet, coffee table, modern 65" LG TV. Bedroom: comfortable bed, spacious wardrobe, bedside tables, desk and LG 55" TV. Hallway: spacious wardrobe with mirror. Bathroom: bathtub, washing machine, storage cabinets. Small household appliances: vacuum cleaner, iron, kettle - everything new! Additional accessories such as an ironing board or clothes dryer. An undoubted advantage is the Daikin air conditioning, which ensures a comfortable temperature all year round, with a fast cooling function in the summer and additional heating outside the heating season (city heating). Additional amenities: Heating and hot water from the municipal network (low operating costs). Guarded, monitored estate with access control. Elevator in the building. Optional parking space in the underground garage: There is a possibility of purchasing a spacious parking space in the underground garage, located in the same building. Price of the space: PLN 80,000. (Possibility of purchasing an apartment with or without a space). This apartment is an ideal investment for rent (short or long term) due to its location and full equipment, or a ready-to-move-in apartment for demanding customers. Don't miss this unique opportunity! Please contact us for additional information and to arrange a presentation.
